title.narrative: Mong Duong 1 Thermal Power Project - Tranche 2

description.narrative: 1. Finance the contract for Engineering design, Procurement and Construction. 2. Finance the consulting service (project implementation consultant) for Tranche 2. 3. Fiinance the construction of the common facilities for MD1 and MD2 Thermal Power plant (MD2) to be built by private sector. These include the fresh water supply system for MD1 and MD2 and the coolinig water discharge channel.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Adequate system generating capacity to meet growing electricity demand in northern Viet Nam

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Ratio of hydro to thermal plant capacity reduced from 37% in 2006 to 27% by 2015.

description.narrative: Adequate system generating capacity to meet growing electricity demand in northern Viet Nam

title.narrative: About 30GW of additional generation capacity by 2020.

description.narrative: Adequate system generating capacity to meet growing electricity demand in northern Viet Nam

title.narrative:
After project completion
1000 MW generating capacity added to the system by 2014.
